Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]

The available values are: 1: shop voucher, 2: product voucher.","key":"wrMRPpi"},{"sample":"1","type":"int32","name":"reward_type","description":"The reward type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: fix_amount voucher, 2: discount_percentage voucher, 3: coin_cashback voucher.","key":"RxTYKcB"},{"sample":"1","type":"int32","name":"usage_quantity","description":"The number of times for this particular voucher could be used.","key":"fXkNWwB"},{"sample":"0","type":"int32","name":"current_usage","description":"Up till now, how many times has this particular voucher already been used.","key":"reedsaz"},{"sample":"1622198847","type":"timestamp","name":"start_time","description":"The timing from when the voucher is valid; so buyer is allowed to claim and to use. ","key":"znSJzDk"},{"sample":"1622807247","type":"timestamp","name":"end_time","description":"The timing until when the voucher is still valid. Any time after this end_time, buyer is not allowed to claim or to use. ","key":"krrRjds"},{"sample":"false","type":"boolean","name":"is_admin","description":"If the voucher is created by Shopee or not.","key":"SthMeBa"},{"sample":"0","type":"int32","name":"voucher_purpose","description":"

The use case for the voucher. The available values are: 0: normal; 1: welcome, 2: referral; 3: shop_follow; 4:shop_game, 5: free_gift, 6: membershipï¼Œ7: Ads

","key":"ppDMpdZ"},{"sample":"[1,2]","type":"int32[]","name":"display_channel_list","description":"The FE channel where the voucher will be displayed. The available values are: 1: display_all, 2: order page, 3: feed, 4: live streaming, [] (empty - which is hidden).","key":"YpycWp"},{"sample":"10.1","type":"float","name":"min_basket_price","description":"The minimum spend required for using this voucher. ","key":"ERjaPzb"},{"sample":"22","type":"int32","name":"percentage","description":"

The discount percentage is set for this particular voucher. Only when it is a discount percentage voucher or coins cashback voucher, api will return a value.

","key":"YadbXkT"},{"sample":"11.1","type":"float","name":"max_price","description":"The max amount of discount/value a user can enjoy by using this particular voucher. Only when it is a fix amount voucher, api will return a value.","key":"spcRXK"},{"sample":"1","type":"int32","name":"cmt_voucher_status","description":"The voucher status in CMT. The available values are: 1:review, 2: approved, 3:reject. Only when this voucher is attending CMT campaign and not being rejected, api will return a value.","key":"bknpFXh"},{"sample":"[123422,122311]","type":"int64[]","name":"item_id_list","description":"The list of items which is applicable for the voucher. Only return a value when it is a product type of voucher.","key":"PfGkiHM"},{"sample":"162078900","type":"timestamp","name":"display_start_time","description":"The timing of when voucher is displayed on shop pages; so buyer is allowed to claim.","key":"RrEhDGb"},{"description":"

The field is used to mark new user voucher/ repeat buyer voucher 

1: new user voucher 

2: repeat buyer voucher: with 1 orders

3. repeat buyer voucher: with 2 orders

","name":"target_voucher","sample":"","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"ncdjCEf"},{"description":"

usecase indicates a specific business scenario that the voucher is created and used for, i.e., new buyer voucher, live voucher, follow shop voucher, etc.

live voucher:6

video voucher:7

campaign voucher:8

follow prize voucher:9

membership voucher:10

game prize voucher:11

sample voucher:12

","name":"usecase","sample":"","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"BKXhEnT"}],"key":"ycnCZnk"}]}
